primary.description: Active real estate agents with listings in luxury and mid-range properties
pain_points: Want to achieve higher selling prices

primary.description: Developers with new residential projects or renovated properties
Individual homeowners planning to sell their properties

secondary.description: Local interior designers for potential partnerships

real_estate_agents.initial_message: Hi {{name}}, This is Design Gaga - Toronto's premium home staging service. We help agents sell properties 40% faster with our professional staging. Check our work: www.designgaga.ca/portfolio
real_estate_agents.follow_up: Hi {{name}}, Following up on our staging services. We're offering a special 10% discount for first-time agent partnerships. Interested in learning more?

property_developers.initial_message: Hi {{name}}, Design Gaga here - We specialize in model home staging that sells. Our staged properties sell for up to 15% more. View our projects: www.designgaga.ca/projects
property_developers.follow_up: Hi {{name}}, Quick follow-up about staging your model homes. We have special packages for developers. Would you like to discuss?

subject_lines: Sell Properties Faster with Professional Staging
Boost Your Listings' Appeal with Design Gaga
Partner with Toronto's Premier Home Staging Service

introduction.subject: Elevate Your Listings with Professional Home Staging
introduction.body:
Hi {{name}},

I noticed you're an active agent in the {{area}} market. I wanted to introduce Design Gaga, Toronto's premium home staging service.

Our staged properties typically:
‚Ä¢ Sell 40% faster
‚Ä¢ Achieve 10-15% higher selling prices
‚Ä¢ Get more viewing requests
‚Ä¢ Stand out in listings with professional photos

Check out our recent projects: www.designgaga.ca/portfolio

Would you be interested in discussing how we can help your listings stand out?

Best regards,
Design Gaga Team
437-987-8666

case_study.subject: How We Helped Sell a {{area}} Property in Just 5 Days
case_study.body:
Hi {{name}},

I wanted to share a quick success story from {{area}}.

We recently staged a property that:
‚Ä¢ Was on the market for 45 days unstaged
‚Ä¢ Sold in 5 days after our staging
‚Ä¢ Received multiple offers
‚Ä¢ Sold for 12% above asking

View the transformation: www.designgaga.ca/case-studies

We'd love to help you achieve similar results with your listings.

Best regards,
Design Gaga Team
437-987-8666

follow_up_sequence.subject: Quick follow-up: Home Staging Partnership
follow_up_sequence.body:
Hi {{name}},

Just following up on my previous email about our home staging services. I'd love to discuss how we can help your listings stand out in the competitive {{area}} market.

Would you be open to a quick call this week?

Best regards,
Design Gaga Team
437-987-8666

script.greeting: Hi {{name}}, this is {{agent_name}} from Design Gaga. Did I catch you at a good time?
script.pitch: I noticed you're active in the {{area}} real estate market. We're a professional home staging company that helps agents sell properties faster and for better prices. Would you be interested in learning how we can help your listings stand out?
value_props: Our staged properties typically sell 40% faster
We help achieve 10-15% higher selling prices
We offer professional photos with our staging
We have a quick 48-hour turnaround time

objection_handling.too_expensive: I understand budget concerns. We actually have flexible packages, and our staging typically helps properties sell for much more than the staging investment.
objection_handling.have_existing_stager: That's great! We'd still love to be your backup option or help with overflow. We can also offer competitive rates for new partnerships.
objection_handling.not_interested: No problem! Would you like me to send you our portfolio and pricing guide for future reference?
objection_handling.bad_timing: I completely understand. When would be a better time to discuss how we can help your listings?
